title: Adding a note to a timesheet
content: Emprez gives you the possibility to add a note when approving a timesheet, this will facilitate the traceability of your records.It is encouraged to write in the note section the reasons for changing any initial parameter planned for the employee's schedule (different time worked, special events associated with the shift, banking ...)To do this:In front of the timesheet, click on  to leave a note,Under Note, enter your note, then click on Save.Any notes entered will be displayed by hovering the icon  at the end of your employee's timesheet.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
